SELECT trs_school_activity.id,trs_school.name school_name,trs_school_activity.course_num,trs_school_activity.sort FROM trs_school_activity as trs_school_activity LEFT JOIN trs_school as trs_school ON trs_school_activity.id = trs_school.id LEFT JOIN trs_activity as trs_activity ON trs_school_activity.id = trs_activity.id
where trs_school_activity.trs_activity_id=#{queryParam.trsActivityId}
